svg.text: 美食探索之旅 / A Journey Through Delicious Cuisine

body.div: Welcome to the exciting world of delicious food! From savory dishes to sweet treats, this card will take you on a culinary adventure. Discover the joy of trying new flavors and learning about the rich history of different cuisines. Whether you're a food lover or just curious, this guide will enrich your taste buds and expand your culinary horizons.
欢迎来到美味佳肴的世界！从美味佳肴到甜点，这张卡片将带你进行一场美食冒险。了解尝试新口味的乐趣，并学习不同菜系的丰富历史。无论你是美食爱好者还是好奇者，这本指南都将丰富你的味蕾，扩展你的美食视野。

- 食物 (shí wù) / food / /fuːd/
- 菜肴 (cài yáo) / dish / /dɪʃ/
- 烹饪 (pēng rèn) / cooking / /ˈkʊkɪŋ/
- 调味 (diào wèi) / seasoning / /ˈsiːzənɪŋ/
- 甜点 (tián diǎn) / dessert / /ˈdesət/
- 面包 (miàn bāo) / bread / /bred/
- 披萨 (pī sà) / pizza / /ˈpiːtsə/
- 汉堡 (hàn bǎo) / hamburger / /ˈhæmbɜːgər/
- 沙拉 (shā lā) / salad / /ˈsæləd/
- 烤肉 (kǎo ròu) / grilled meat / /ˈɡriːld mɪt/
- 寿司 (sòu sī) / sushi / /ˈsʊʃi/
- 汤 (tāng) / soup / /suːp/
- 烤鸡 (kǎo jī) / roasted chicken / /ˈroʊtɪd tʃɪkɪn/
- 炒饭 (chǎo fàn) / fried rice / /fraɪd raɪt/
- 披萨酱 (pī sà jiàng) / pizza sauce / /ˈpiːtsə sɔːs/
- 面条 (miàn tiáo) / noodles / /ˈnuːdlz/
- 奶油 (nǎi yóu) / cream / /kriːm/
- 冰淇淋 (bīng qílín) / ice cream / /ˈaɪskriːm/
- 巧克力 (qiǎo kè lǐ) / chocolate / /ˈtʃɒklət/

- 厨师 (chú shī) / chef / /tʃɛf/
- 厨房 (chú fáng) / kitchen / /kɪtʃɪn/
- 餐厅 (cān tīng) / restaurant / /ˈrɛstrɒnt/
- 餐具 (cān jù) / tableware / /ˈteɪblweə/
- 筷子 (kuài zi) / chopsticks / /ˈtʃɒpstɪks/
- 刀叉 (dāo cā) / knife and fork / /ˈnaɪf ənd fɔːrk/
- 餐巾 (cān jīn) / napkin / /ˈnæpkɪn/
- 菜单 (cān dī) / menu / /ˈmenjuː/
- 服务员 (fú wù yuán) / waiter / /ˈweɪtər/
- 收银员 (shōu yín yuán) / cashier / /ˈkeɪʃɪər/
- 饮料 (yǐn liào) / drink / /drɪŋk/
- 水果 (shuǐ guǒ) / fruit / /fruːt/
- 蔬菜 (shū cài) / vegetable / /ˈvedʒʊtəbəl/
- 肉类 (ròu lèi) / meat / /miːt/
